Anthony Fait.Action: Grabs Miles to stop him from falling onto the high-voltage rail, saving him from danger.
Grabs Miles just before he falls onto the high-voltage third rail, preventing a serious accident.
Leads Miles through the subway tunnel, stays alert and cautious, instructing him to keep it tight.
Successfully avoids an oncoming train by leaping to the wall and pressing close, showing situational awareness.
Orders Tommy to proceed despite Tommy's alarm and hesitation.
Coordinates and trusts the team during a high-risk operation, uses 'Faith' as a rallying word to inspire the group.
Successfully disables a vault door using a SAM missile, efficiently opens the vault, quickly empties drawers, and identifies high-value diamonds confidently.
Stops to admire and pocket a pink diamond potentially useful for him, showing awareness beyond just theft.
